TopicTitle: [0.15 Stock] F-64 Peregrine - Simple, easy, and fun aircraft

Articles.Content:
Inspired by the F-56 Spearhead (http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=12353.0).

Like the subject says, this aircraft is incredibly easy to fly.
I\'m pretty sure that bi-coupler isn\'t stock.

I\'m pretty sure that bi-coupler isn\'t stock.

It\'s a kind-of-cheap-trick done by rotating Mk1 fuselage parts (or whatever you like) so that they clip into the Mk2. It adds a lot of interesting possibilities.
No, he\'s using the JAWRD Mk2 Hull Bicoupler. You can get the same effect, though, with the above method

No, he\'s using the JAWRD Mk2 Hull Bicoupler. You can get the same effect, though, with the above method

Hey look at that, so he is .
This bicoupler should be added to stock parts IMO. It\'s really useful and a great addition to the Mk2 fuselage.
